title: Budget 2022 LIVE Updates: Nirmala Sitharaman leaves Finance Ministry, Budget speech at 11 am today - Moneycontrol.com
content: Budget 2022 LIVE Updates: Nirmala Sitharaman leaves Finance Ministry, Budget speech at 11 am today  Moneycontrol.com
description: Union Budget 2022 LIVE: Keeping with recent tradition, Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman will announce Union Budget 2022 today, on February 1. This year will be her fourth Budget after 2019, 2020 and 2021
